listofFAQ.name: Who are you?
listofFAQ.des: My name is Alejandro Azofeifa, I have been bringing solutions to customers when they have required help with Azure Active Directory technologies for the past 3 years. (Updated in 2020)

listofFAQ.name: Can I participate and contribute in the project?
listofFAQ.des: Yes! I am open to collaborate. If you have experience implementing solutions on AAD and you believe something should be added please email me and talk about your possible contribution.

listofFAQ.name: Are you open of Feedback?
listofFAQ.des: Of course! If you believe something should be better explained, there is a 'typo' or you have any other kind of feedback please all means let me know.

listofFAQ.name: How accurate is the information here?
listofFAQ.des: I usually test the solutions I provide and do a lot of proof checking in the documentation before updating this website.

listofFAQ.name: How can I reach you?
listofFAQ.des: You can email me at Alejandro@abcazuread.com
